segments.text: Do you know how to drive ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you teach me how to drive ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you gotten your learner's permit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have my learner's permit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever been behind the wheel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've only driven a car one time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You do know all the controls in the car , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me when you want me to teach you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can do it when you have some time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not busy tomorrow . Call me then .
segments.speaker: S2
